ActTransportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada Act
PrecisAppointment of J. RICHARD W. HALL of Surrey, British Columbia, to be a part-time member of the Transportation Appeal Tribunal of Canada, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of four years.
